data.title: Multidisciplinary Centre in Bondi Junction
data.meta_description: Developmental Paediatrics specialist team: Paediatricians, Clinical Psychologists, Neuropsychologists, Speech Pathologists, Dietitians, Continence Nurse
data.text:
EARLY CHILDHOOD MULTIDISCIPLINARY ASSESSMENT CLINIC (for ages 2-5)

Consult with a Developmental Paediatrician and a Speech Pathologist or Psychologist to determine the direction of further assessment and therapy for your child.

Learn More

SCHOOL AGE MULTIDISCIPLINARY ASSESSMENT DAY

(for ages 6-17)

A comprehensive, collaborative team assessment enabling busy families to have their child or adolescent seen by an expert team in one centre.

Learn More

ADOLESCENT MULTIDISCIPLINARY ASSESSMENT DAY /AMDAC

(for ages 11-17)

Consult with an Adolescent Health Physician and a Counselling Psychologist to gain a better understanding of the factors currently impacting your adolescentâ€™s health and wellbeing, and jointly plan a way forward.

Learn More

FEEDING THERAPY

Feeding difficulties are common in children and can impact on growth and nutrition, oral motor skills, communication, general health, developmental outcomes and quality of life. Our Feeding therapist supports children and their caregivers address a diverse range of feeding issues.

Learn More

SPEECH, LANGUAGE and COMMUNICATION

We see children from as young as 12 months to school age. Our experienced clinicians offer clinic based or telehealth sessions. They will liaise as needed with preschools, schools, and other health professionals. Using a neurodiversity affirming approach we support your child in developing their communication potential.

Learn More
